cards.title: German backpacker found after 11 nights in Australia's outback
cards.summary: Carolina Wilga, 26, from Germany, was found after 11 nights lost in Western Australia's outback. Police say she walked 24km (15 miles) away from her van in a "confused and disorientated" state. She suffered from exhaustion, dehydration, "extensive insect bites" and an injured foot

cards.title: Israeli settlers kill Palestinians in West Bank attack, health ministry says
cards.summary: Sayfollah Musallet, a 20-year-old dual US citizen from Florida, was beaten to death by Israeli settlers. Mohammed al-Shalabi, also 23, died after being shot in the chest, it added. Israeli military said stones were thrown at Israelis near Sinjil and a violent confrontation developed in

cards.title: A bridge too far? Prague railway project draws criticism
cards.summary: The 123-year-old Vysehrad railway bridge in Prague is set to be replaced and relocated. Prague is one of Europe's architectural gems: largely untouched by ten centuries of invasion and war, it attracts some 8m tourists a year.
